description:
Item Details
Shipping & Policies

Size: 12.5'' (L) * 4'' (D) * 12''(H)
Color: brown
Style: messenger bag,crossbody bag.

Please make sure to offer your detail address and CELLPHONE NUMBER when you place the order, so that the shipping company can deliver the package to you quickly and easily.

ABOUT OUR LEATHER BAGS:
Leather processing art a lot, and outline can be broadly divided into two types: Polished leather, oil skin.

Crazy Horse leather features: crazy skin texture, thick, rough shape, with strong leather covering, leather-messy, irregular lines and wrinkles spots, some leather-even a few shallow scratches, with her fingernails gently scraped surface will leave a trail with the Palm and gently wipe the marks fade away.

Oil leather features: depending on the method of skin can also be subdivided into: soft skin oil (oil wax, fine lines, Buffalo skin), hard skin (smooth oil skin).

Soft skin texture is very soft and natural, surface smooth, flexible and clear texture, pattern uniform, pull on the natural extension of 2-3cm and color effects;

Smooth skin texture, thick, leather shiny clean, uniform color, smooth surface there can be some of the skin from wrinkles patches formed naturally, surface may also be accompanied by a few minor scratches;

These are all characteristics of the first layer leather handmade leather goods, is not a quality problem, should not be reason to return, so it is important to consider before you buy clear, if you can not accept these characteristics do not buy.

On chromatic aberration: we purchase of head layer cowhide are is used quality material, each Zhang cowhide are no after processing, each cowhide are unique personality, impossible appeared lines color completely same of two pieces products, on like nature impossible has two completely same of leaves as, you received of products leather lines and color may and pictures slightly has difference, pattern of pressure printed shades also slightly has different, please to physical for associate.

This bag is made of superior cow leather in black, which the leather is very thick and top quality. It can be carried as a everyday bag for men. The bag size is large enough to fit for a 14 or 15 inches laptop. 

Please note that this briefcase come with a shoulder strap.

• Long Adjustable Shoulder Strap
• Solid Brass Hardware
• Fabric Lining
• Many Pockets inside, including cell pocket, certificate pocket, pen slots.
• Wall zipper and interlayer zipper inside of the bag

Handle Height: 6cm;
Shoulder Strap(Adjustable): 140cm

Color: Coffee
